abstract: Landon Donovan says the Red Bulls play dirty. Are they the only ones?
snippet: Landon Donovan says the Red Bulls play dirty. Are they the only ones?
lead_paragraph: After Sunday's 1-0 Galaxy victory over the Red Bulls in the opener of their two-game, total-goals M.L.S. playoff series, Landon Donovan of Los Angeles ripped into the home team for their "dirty" play. Video below.

headline.main: The Dirty Tackle (Beckham)? The Dirty Team (New York)? Or Is It Just Red Bulls vs. Galaxy?
